column5: Phnom Penh police arrested a Korean man at the Phnom Penh International Airport for defrauding three victims out of almost $ 3 million.------The Korean man
column6: who is also a Cambodian national
column10: out of nearly $ 3 million. ------The arrest was made on the order of the prosecutor and appeared to have taken place after the suspect had just landed. ------Park Heayoung
column12: was taken away for further proceedings.------The Korean man is also reported to be seeking legal assistance in order to be released. ------AREY NEWS
